welcome.setupIntro: Ruhanduziyé tajrobeyé scomu ru dar cand qadamé kwtuh anjum dahim.
welcome.warning: Hoscdur! In yek narmafzuré piscarze scode mibuscad va momken ast scumelé mosckeluti buscad.

wizard.title: Judwgaré Berwzresuni
wizard.description: Motmaen scavim ke dudehuyé scomu be dorosti montaqel scodeand! Baruyé edume baëdi ru kelik konid.

access.title: Usuniyé Dastresi
access.description: Baruyé motmaen scodanetun az in ke hame ciz tebqé meylé scomust tajrobeyétun ru sefurescisuzi konid.

colors.title: Rangetun ru entexub konid
colors.description: Yek rang entexub konid ke bu ehsusetun suzgur buscad.
